title: Chat tabs
body:
I'd like to have better chat with tabs. (Example is in attachment)
Cos having private messages, messages to the channel and messages who entered/left the channel in one chat window is not good idea. Sometimes you can't find needed message. 

I think it'll be good to have tabs:
-) Server messages
-) Channel messages
-) Private massages (separate tab for each player who you are writing)



*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/feature-requests/1126/ .
